nodes.text: Blue Gown of the Sullen Moon
The Blue Gown of the Sullen Moon was a religious garb worn by "The High Priest", a Lorrdian spiritual leader of a congregation of the Brotherhood of the Beatific Countenance.
The name of this vestment is a reference to alternative rock band They Might Be Giants' 1989 song, "Nightgown of the Sullen Moon."
